snippet: Dillon Gee is sidelined after having surgery, and the Mets used the roster spot on Josh Edgin instead of Matt Harvey, a former first-round pick.
abstract: MLB Roundup; New York Mets pitcher Dillon Gee is sidelined after having surgery, and the Mets use the roster spot on Josh Edgin, who made a strong impression in spring training, instead of Matt Harvey, a former first-round pick; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dillon Gee is sidelined after having surgery, and the Mets used the roster spot on Josh Edgin instead of Matt Harvey, a former first-round pick.

headline.seo: With Gee Out, Mets Choose Edgin Over Harvey
headline.main: With Gee Out, Mets Choose Left-Hander
headline.print_headline: With Gee Out, Mets Choose Left-Hander
